content.prompt: Which of the following was a historical context for the development depicted in the image?

choices.label: The resettlement of Mormons escaping religious persecution
The arrival of new immigrants in the United States
The migration of farmers fleeing dust storms
The forced relocation of people suspected of disloyalty during wartime

topic.text: 6.9: Responses to Immigration in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
